algorithm_technique: Simulate operations by tracking string length and character shifts using bitwise operations on k.
problem_summary_simple: Find the k-th character of a string that grows and changes based on operations.
problem_summary_technical: Simulate string transformations (doubling, character increment) by mapping k to its position in the final string using bitwise logic.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by working backward from k to determine the character's origin.
Bitwise operations on k effectively simulate the doubling and shifting of characters.
The maximum number of operations to consider is limited by the bit length of k.
